meanings.definition: Having been educated; having knowledge or learning.
meanings.sent1: She is an educated woman who speaks multiple languages.
meanings.sent2: The educated professor shared insightful information with the class.
meanings.sent3: The educated cat always knew when it was time for dinner.
meanings.sent4: His educated mind was a treasure trove of wisdom and understanding.
meanings.sent5: The educated owl could solve any problem with ease.

meanings.definition: Showing evidence of a good education; possessing knowledge or intelligence.
meanings.sent1: The educated students aced their exams with flying colors.
meanings.sent2: Her educated responses during the interview impressed the panel.
meanings.sent3: The educated squirrel stored its nuts in alphabetical order.
meanings.sent4: His educated choices in life led him to great success.
meanings.sent5: The educated dolphin amazed researchers with its problem-solving skills.
